name: Hallway
setup: Agent first sees a colored cue block, then moves down a hallway and must pick the matching colored goal.
goal: Reach the goal that matches the initial cue color.

agents.description: Single agent that must remember the cue after it is no longer visible.

behavior_parameters.vector_observation_space: Ray-based observation of nearby walls and goals.
behavior_parameters.actions: 1 discrete branch with 4 actions (move forward/back or rotate left/right).
